title: New Mix: Lucy Dacus, Producer George Martin's Secret 'Ray Cathode' Project, More
description:
All Songs Considered host Bob Boilen shares his favorite new tunes of the week including a "Hot and Heavy" track from Lucy Dacus, and Beatles producer George Martin's little-known side project, Ray Cathode.

1. Lucy Dacus: "Hot & Heavy," from Home Video
2. Uwade: "The Man Who Sees Tomorrow" (Single)
3. Field Music: "When You Last Heard From Linda," from Flat White Moon
4. Ray Cathode (George Martin and Maddalena Fagandini): "Time Beat" (Single)
5. Ray Cathode (George Martin and Maddalena Fagandini): "Waltz In Orbit" (Single)
6. Rosie Tucker: "Barbara Ann," from Sucker Supreme
7. Smoothboi Ezra: "Stuck" from Stuck EP
